name: codesets
description: A shared codesets / resources router for virtual finland projects

scripts.build: npm run build:codesets && npm run build:escoApi
scripts.build:infra: npm -C infra install && npm -C infra run build
scripts.deploy: npm run prebuild && npm run deploy:codesets && npm run deploy:escoApi
scripts.deploy:codesets: npm run build:codesets && npm run -C infra deploy:codesets
scripts.deploy:escoApi: npm run build:escoApi && npm run -C infra deploy:escoApi
scripts.dev:codesets: nodemon --delay 80ms --watch 'src' -e 'ts' --ignore src/escoApi.ts --exec "npm run build:codesets && npm run serve:codesets"
scripts.dev:escoApi: nodemon --delay 80ms --watch src/escoApi.ts --watch src/utils -e 'ts'  --exec "npm run build:escoApi && npm run serve:escoApi"
scripts.start: nodemon --delay 80ms --watch 'src' -e 'ts'  --exec "npm run build && npm run serve"
